The addition of SBMM has made this game incredibly unfun, why introduce a matchmaking system like this to a game that is so unbalanced it's ridiculous. Believe me I want to like this game. The killers look amazing and there are survivors that represent my favourite horror movies. But this game just isn't fun anymore and that makes me sad.

You only need to look at the dwindling player base to see I'm not the only one who feels this way. 5 gens get demolished whilst I'm sitting on one hook or I'm staring at a killer on hook as camping/tunnneling is the most effective way to play. This is all down to poor decision making. Bring back the fun.

Зарево, пукан горит,
Сурвы отворили воротА.
Кто-то на кортах шумит,
Думаешь:"Возьму тебя!"...

Водрузив на свои плечи,
Огребаешь раз ты пять,
Хош фонарик, иль ректальны свечи...
Сурву - суждено сбежать.

И пройдя круги все ада,
С глаз убрав остатки слёз,
Ты кричишь им в след: "Не надо...",
Но живёшь не в мире грёз.

Вновь вернётся всё к истокам,
Свиноферма, крюк, фонарь...
Сопротивляться им накладно,
Повториться всё, как в старь...

Можно закрыть глаза на все баги и отсутствие какого-либо развития игры, но когда ты покупаешь игру и дополнения и встречаешь откровенных читеров, которые даже не парятся, чтобы скрыть свой аккаунт в стиме, то тут уже молчать сложно. Не знаю о чем думают разработчики, но играть за мана стало совершенно невыносимо. Некоторые уже не стесняются не просто немного юзать спидхак и лагсвитчеры, но и откровенно перемещаться по карте и за ее пределами со скоростью 300%, 5 генераторов чинятся за 30 сек, лечение других выживших занимает 1 секунду, ну и конечно же незабываемые прыжки высоко над всеми зданиями. Весь Ютюб завален видео с чудо выжившими, скилл которых поражает воображение. По сравнению с бездействием разрабов по отношению к читерам, все остальное уже не важно.

Game was alright til SBMM (S*** Based Match-Making).

In this recent "update" (6.1.0) they completely gutted Survivor while also buffing Killer to an absurd degree. Killers can perform actions faster and have shorter cooldowns, while Survivors gain less distance after getting hit. Majority of games, Killers will camp more often because gens take longer to complete, or tunnel because the only anti-tunnel perk in the game got completely gutted and its 3 second stun is laughable.

Even as a Killer main, I think these base changes are completely unwarranted. I would've been fine with one or the other, but not both. If you get hit and there isn't a safe window or pallet within spitting distance, you're guaranteed to go down shortly after. It's insane these base changes made it to live servers. Perks being reworked I'm (mostly) okay with, since the Meta hadn't changed since late 2016 prior to this update.

So what does a typical round in the fog look like now? As Survivor, unless you're in a full 4-man party, 8 out of 10 games you're going to have teammates have a 10 second chase and give up on hook almost immediately, ruining the game for everyone 2 minutes in. On the other hand as Killer, you wait 10 minute queues for 4 minute games because chases are so short now, especially for high mobile killers like Blight and Nurse. It's baffling.

I really do think some changes need to be reverted and looked at more closely for a more balanced and healthy game, but knowing how stubborn BHVR is that won't happen until late 2055 because Patrick and Almo need their "data" until their game loses 75% of their playerbase again.

DBD is dying just wait for VHS. The game itself is fun but BHVR doesn't care about the player base at all, rewarding lazy and toxic play styles with higher mmr rankings. Not to mention the numerous bugs they can't seem to patch, or the player concerns both killers and survivors have that they completely ignore. A good match is rare but a ton of fun, if your're gonna play you should definitely play with friends.

Ideia original com história de personagens muito boas, mas pouco exploradas. Em visão geral, a gameplay é divertida e única, não variando durante os anos o que pode ser repetitivo para muitos. O jogo embora seja bem simples, não é muito bem otimizado tanto quanto balanceado. Pro jogador casual é uma grande pedida.

Игра слишком дисбалансная, и речь не об игроках, да есть кемперы или те кто хорошо играют и против них сложно, понятное дело, и так же есть нубы , но речь не об этом, а об перках и возможностях многих персонажей, как некоторых выживших так и в большей части убийц, самый дисбалансный и практически непобедимый( ну по крайней мере , сколько раз попадался я ни разу , не то что я, никто из моей команды не выживал) это - канибал(если я правильно написал) , короче мужик с пилой, как только он свою хуйню врубает, так ваншотит всех разом, не важно в каком вы состоянии, и даже может одновременно троих, на моих глазах такое было, все катки против него заканчиваются обычно +- за 2-4 минуты и это не в пользу выживших. По мимо него есть еще несколько убийц с слишком ахуевшими перками, но канибал самый дисбалансный и не проходимый, играя против него вы не будете думать о том как чинить генераторы, а будете о том, как бы он вас с 1 тычки не уебал , при том что у вас фулл хп. (с него больше всего рвет очко и я вообще обычно ливаю, когда против даунов на канибале попадаюсь)

I miss the times when I could expect the bugs and the toxicity and the dumb things developers say in statements to at least be somewhat understandable.  Now, the game is consistently broken in many ways to the point where entire killers are disabled, I have a better time in League of Legends chat, and the developers have become a basic laughing stock while avoiding the problems this game has (and even promoting a lot of the toxicity in the community).  This is ignoring the NFT bullscheiße they did with Hellraiser, the ability to dox your opponents/teammates by playing the game, losing one of their best licenses, the blatant money grabs from cosmetics and a battle pass (that is, unlike what is said, not casual friendly by any means), the impossible grind to get a character even near viable (let alone meta), the balance becoming evermore insanely skewed away from what the community finds fun (not getting into killer/survivor sided arguments here, and I'd recommend avoiding them), and the entire hacking situation with report and block functions that either don't work or don't do anything.  This game has become a disappointment to me and many others.

I never played it for the horror aspect (and I'm not even a horror fan in general), but the scariest stuff is gory cosmetics that make me want to puke and sounds that have made me need to take my headset off to avoid pain.  I don't even care if it's not horror because that's not why I played it, but their idea of making it horror by gore and migraines does not make up for any of the other issues with gameplay in general.  Also, the lore has been retroactively discontinuous more than what J. K. Rowling has done to the Harry Potter franchise at this point, even to the degree that apparently there's crows in Chile (there aren't).

I have met many great people in my life by playing this game and joining communities around it.  I will cherish my experiences with them forever.  Nothing the developers can do will change that.  However, almost everyone I met through this game has decided that it's not worth the mental anguish to even think about opening this game.  People are even leaving communities to avoid this game now.  Of course, this also doesn't mention the recurring problem of many content creators being horrible people (and not just by toxicity), but that is somewhat unfair to dump on the developers, even though it is definitely worth mentioning to people before recommending this game.  I can hold the dox issue against the developers though since that's in their control.  And no, BHVR, the empty gestures towards diversity do not make up for any of the hate you have enabled.

I bought the game years ago.  I had fun with it for years, years ago.  The state it is in now is embarrassing and, to be honest, the development team should feel embarrassed.  I cannot in good conscious recommend this game to anyone unless BHVR steps up their game and tries to actually improve this game.  I want them to improve the game.  I've seen them do it in the past.  It's been a while, but it's happened.  They can do better, or at least put in effort to try.  Until then, this will be a hard no to recommending this game anytime soon.
once you get into the game its fun but very much favors 1 side over the other
